'- 100vh' : '100vh'}) const getPosition = () => { window.scrollY > 50 ? setScroll(true) : setScroll(false); }; const getWidth = () => { setWidth(window.innerWidth) } useEffect(() => { setWidth(window.innerWidth) window.addEventListener("scroll", getPosition); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", getPosition); }); useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("resize", getWidth); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", getWidth); }); if (width > 1000) { return ( <>
